

mm<-function(rcnt,ccnt,init){
  total<-rcnt*ccnt  
  v<-double(total)  
  v[1:total]<-init
  rst<-matrix(v,rcnt,ccnt)  
  return(rst)  
}



```{r}  
source("W11-1.R")
```  

```{r}   
mm(7,8,678)  
```
